full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GCOD GZHUNG THAR 'DOD DED DPON MA'I DGONGS DON NYAMS SU LEN TSUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033A *, ,DE LTAR GCOD KYI t'I KKAm THAR 'DOD DAD DPON MA'I DGONGS DON GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RJE DRUNG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS MOS 'DUN DRAG POS 'DI LTAR GYIS ZHES BSKUL BAS MTSAMS SBYAR, RJE RIN PO CHE SOGS KYIS MDZAD PA'I GCOD GZHUNG DBANG POR BZHAG ,RANG GI BLA MA'I ZHAL SHES KYIS BRGYAN TE NGES MED GNYAN KHROD PA DKA' BCU TSUL KHRIMS MING @033B CAN GYIS MA GCIG JO MO SHANGS SKAR MA'I NYE 'DABS BRAG SKYA SENGGE 'GYED 'DRA'I DBEN GNAS BRAG SKYA'I KHANG PHUG TU BRIS PA'O, ,
